about_the_game:
Hyper Desktop is currently in early access and needs your feedback.

The #1 VTubing application on iOS is now coming to desktop in an early beta! Professional avatar content creation tools for beginners or seasoned VTubers alike. Supports Hyper Avatars and VRM files.

  • Create your Hyper Avatar. Customize a stunning 3D Hyper Avatar for VTubing. Each model is crafted in-house by our talented artists. All Hyper VTuber models are pre-rigged and ready to go, with hundreds of assets to choose from.
  • Import your existing VTuber model. If you already have your own VRoid 3D avatars, .VRM files, VRChat character, those work with Hyper too. Import and use them in our Studio to create content for TikTok, Twitch, Twitter, or just to share with friends.
  • Built-in face and hand motion capture. Our motion capture technology lets you VTube with just a webcam. We support facial motion capture, and hand motion capture with more coming soon.
  • Use Hyper as a Virtual Webcam. Use our Webcam mode to access your Hyper Avatar anywhere. Supports Twitch, Youtube, Zoom, and more.
  • Supports streaming software. Hyper’s virtual webcam allows you to use OBS, StreamLabs, or any other streaming software that supports camera input. Use tools like our green screen backgrounds to overlay your avatar on streams, gameplay, videos, and more.
  • Join meetings with your VTuber. The virtual webcam feature works with Discord, OBS, Zoom, Google Meet, Microsoft Teams, and more.
  • Access hundreds of emotes and poses. Prebuilt emotes and poses allow your VTuber to come alive. Use them to dance, sing, fight, and more.
  • Manage all of your VTuber models and assets. Have many VTuber models, multiple characters, or many outfits to switch between? Hyper lets you manage all your avatar assets in one place.
  • Get started in minutes instead of hours. VTubing can be complicated, Hyper makes it easy with an intuitive interface. Download and get started right away.

Hyper is constantly evolving and we're always improving our avatar technology and support for more devices. If you’d like to join our community or leave feedback, consider joining our Discord:

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: macOS 14+
  • Processor: Apple M1 or Intel Core M
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

  • OS: Windows 10
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Requires a discrete GPU (such as an RTX 3060)
  • DirectX: Version 11
